languages.text: Стремительность нашего удара оказалась обоюдоострым мечом. Смело прорываясь сквозь вражеский огонь, много техники и солдат сгинуло в ловушках предателей Человечества. Танки увязали в грудах тел, месили их гусеницами. Лишь благодаря бесчисленным жертвам нам удалось прорвать оборону противника.

traits.locale_text: Стремительность нашего удара оказалась обоюдоострым мечом. Смело прорываясь сквозь вражеский огонь, много танков и солдат сгинуло в ловушках подонков из Последнего рассвета. Леман Рассы увязали в грудах тел чужих и наших солдат и не могли пройти вперед. Лишь благодаря бесчисленным жертвам нам удалось прорвать оборону противника.

languages.text: The swiftness of our assault turned out to be a double-edged sword. By bravely charging into enemy fire, we lost many vehicles and soldiers to the traps set by the betrayers of Humanity. The tanks were getting stuck in the mounds of bodies, trying to chew through them with their treads. We breached the enemy's defences at the cost of countless lives.
languages.original_text: Стремительность нашего удара оказалась обоюдоострым мечом. Смело прорываясь сквозь вражеский огонь, много техники и солдат сгинуло в ловушках предателей Человечества. Танки увязали в грудах тел, месили их гусеницами. Лишь благодаря бесчисленным жертвам нам удалось прорвать оборону противника.

traits.locale_text: The swiftness of our assault turned out to be a double-edged sword. By bravely charging through enemy fire, we lost many vehicles and soldiers to the traps set by the betrayers of Humanity. The tanks were getting stuck in the mounds of bodies, trying to chew through them with their treads. We breached the enemy's defences at the cost of countless lives.

The tanks were getting stuck in the mounds of bodies, trying to chew through them with their treads. We breached the enemy's defences at the cost of countless lives.

The tanks were getting stuck in the mounds of bodies, trying to chew through them with their treads. We breached the enemy's defences at the cost of countless lives.

The swiftness of our assault turned out to be a double-edged sword. By bravely charging into enemy fire, we lost many vehicles and soldiers to the traps set by the betrayers of Humanity. The tanks were getting stuck in the mounds of bodies, trying to chew through them with their treads. We breached the enemy's defences at the cost of countless lives.

languages.text: 事实证明，快速突袭的决定是把双刃剑。尽管我们勇敢地冲向敌人的炮火，但人类叛徒设置的陷阱却让我们的载具与士兵受到了惨重损失。坦克被困在尸山血海之中，挣扎着想要碾过这些障碍。最终，我们付出了无数生命的代价，突破了敌人的防线。
languages.original_text: The swiftness of our assault turned out to be a double-edged sword. By bravely charging into enemy fire, we lost many vehicles and soldiers to the traps set by the betrayers of Humanity. The tanks were getting stuck in the mounds of bodies, trying to chew through them with their treads. We breached the enemy's defences at the cost of countless lives.

traits.locale_text: 事实证明，快速突袭的决定是把双刃剑。尽管我们勇敢地冲向敌人的炮火，但人类叛徒设置的陷阱却让我们的载具与士兵受到了惨重损失。坦克被困在尸山血海之中，挣扎着想要碾过这些障碍。最终，我们付出了无数生命的代价，突破了敌人的防线。

languages.text: La rapidité de notre assaut s'est avérée à double tranchant. En lançant courageusement la charge sous les tirs ennemis, nous avons perdu de nombreux soldats et véhicules, terrassés par les pièges que les traîtres à l'humanité avaient posés. Nos chars se retrouvaient bloqués par les montagnes de cadavres qu'ils tentaient de franchir grâce à leurs chenilles. Si nous avons réussi à percer les défenses adverses, c'est uniquement au prix d'un nombre incalculable de vies.
languages.original_text: The swiftness of our assault turned out to be a double-edged sword. By bravely charging into enemy fire, we lost many vehicles and soldiers to the traps set by the betrayers of Humanity. The tanks were getting stuck in the mounds of bodies, trying to chew through them with their treads. We breached the enemy's defences at the cost of countless lives.

traits.locale_text: La rapidité de notre assaut s'est avérée à double tranchant. En lançant courageusement la charge sous les tirs ennemis, nous avons perdu de nombreux soldats et véhicules, terrassés par les pièges que les traîtres à l'humanité avaient posés. Nos chars se retrouvaient bloqués par les montagnes de cadavres qu'ils tentaient de franchir grâce à leurs chenilles. Si nous avons réussi à percer les défenses adverses, c'est uniquement au prix d'un nombre incalculable de vies.

languages.text: 我々の迅速な攻撃は諸刃の剣であることが判明した。敵の砲火に果敢に突撃したことで、人類の裏切り者が仕掛けた罠にかかり、多くの車両と兵士を失った。戦車は死体の山にはまり、トレッドで引き裂いて進もうとした。無数の命を犠牲にして、我々は敵の防衛網を突破した。
languages.original_text: The swiftness of our assault turned out to be a double-edged sword. By bravely charging into enemy fire, we lost many vehicles and soldiers to the traps set by the betrayers of Humanity. The tanks were getting stuck in the mounds of bodies, trying to chew through them with their treads. We breached the enemy's defences at the cost of countless lives.

traits.locale_text: 我々の迅速な攻撃は諸刃の剣であることが判明した。敵の砲火に果敢に突撃したことで、人類の裏切り者が仕掛けた罠にかかり、多くの車両と兵士を失った。戦車は死体の山にはまり、トレッドで引き裂いて進もうとした。無数の命を犠牲にして、我々は敵の防衛網を突破した。

languages.text: La presteza de nuestro asaltó fue una espada de doble filo. Al cargar contra el fuego enemigo, perdimos numerosos vehículos y soldados ante las trampas de los traidores a la Humanidad. Los tanques se atascaban en las montañas de cadáveres, intentando atravesarlas con sus orugas. Logramos penetrar las defensas del enemigo, pero perdimos innumerables vidas para ello.
languages.original_text: The swiftness of our assault turned out to be a double-edged sword. By bravely charging into enemy fire, we lost many vehicles and soldiers to the traps set by the betrayers of Humanity. The tanks were getting stuck in the mounds of bodies, trying to chew through them with their treads. We breached the enemy's defences at the cost of countless lives.

traits.locale_text: La presteza de nuestro asaltó fue una espada de doble filo. Al cargar contra el fuego enemigo, perdimos numerosos vehículos y soldados ante las trampas de los traidores a la Humanidad. Los tanques se atascaban en las montañas de cadáveres, intentando atravesarlas con sus orugas. Logramos penetrar las defensas del enemigo, pero perdimos innumerables vidas para ello.

languages.text: Die Geschwindigkeit unseres Angriffs entpuppte sich als zweischneidiges Schwert. Indem wir uns mutig ins feindliche Feuer stürzten, verloren wir viele Fahrzeuge und Soldaten an die Fallen, welche die Verräter an der Menschheit gestellt hatten. Die Panzer blieben in den Bergen von Leichen hängen, mühten sich ab, sich mit ihren Ketten durch sie hindurchzugraben. Wir durchbrachen die Verteidigung des Feindes auf Kosten unzähliger Leben.
languages.original_text: The swiftness of our assault turned out to be a double-edged sword. By bravely charging into enemy fire, we lost many vehicles and soldiers to the traps set by the betrayers of Humanity. The tanks were getting stuck in the mounds of bodies, trying to chew through them with their treads. We breached the enemy's defences at the cost of countless lives.

traits.locale_text: Die Geschwindigkeit unseres Angriffs entpuppte sich als zweischneidiges Schwert. Indem wir uns mutig ins feindliche Feuer stürzten, verloren wir viele Fahrzeuge und Soldaten an die Fallen, welche die Verräter an der Menschheit gestellt hatten. Die Panzer blieben in den Bergen von Leichen hängen, mühten sich ab, sich mit ihren Ketten durch sie hindurchzugraben. Wir durchbrachen die Verteidigung des Feindes auf Kosten unzähliger Leben.

languages.text: Taarruzumuzun sürati, iki yanı da bilenmiş bir bıçak misali bizi de kesti. Gözümüzü karartıp daldığımız düşman ateşinde, İnsanlığın düşmanlarının kurduğu tuzaklarda birçok araç ve asker yitirdik. Tanklar; ceset yığınlarına saplanıp kalıyor, dişleriyle cesetleri çiğneyerek kurtulmaya çalışıyordu. Düşman savunmalarını, bedelini sayısız canla ödeyerek aştık.
languages.original_text: The swiftness of our assault turned out to be a double-edged sword. By bravely charging into enemy fire, we lost many vehicles and soldiers to the traps set by the betrayers of Humanity. The tanks were getting stuck in the mounds of bodies, trying to chew through them with their treads. We breached the enemy's defences at the cost of countless lives.
